item.title: Power Shortage Hits Vietnam, a Production Hub for Apple and Samsung
item.description: ![](news photo about vietnam,power shortage,apple,samsung –ar 2:11.webp) Power Shortage Hits Vietnam, a Production Hub for Apple and Samsung Vietnam is experiencing a severe power shortage, which is impacting manufacturers that have flocked to the country because they view it as an alternative to China.
